channel.title: Javascript on Everyday I Learn
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on Everyday I Learn

item.title: Deep Copy to Avoid Value Reference
item.description: Playing around application states in ReactJS or VueJS is quite fun. But it’s not fun anymore if we (accidentally) mutate the state while doing a search from the state.

item.title: Javascript's Template Literals
item.description: When I’m conducting a workshop for Facebook Developer Circle Malang, one of our participants asking how gql works. I know it’s called template literals, but how did template literals can behave like a function (but without parentheses)?

item.title: React Native with GraphQL
item.description: TL;DR; React Native apps with Expo.io and GraphQL (React-Apollo). Less pain, less code.
